narrative.narrative: Tennessee Airways was based at Knoxville in its named after state. It had a hub at Memphis also. It was around from 1978 to 1987. It also flew to the TN cities of Chattanooga,Nashville and the Tri-Cities. It went to Huntsville,AL Atlanta,GA Cincinatti,OH Lexington,KY London,KY Charlotte,NC Greensboro,NC Pinehurst,NC Greenville-Spartanburg,SC and Washington D.C. Its main fleet consisted of Embraer 110 Bandeirante's while it also used Piper PA-31's. Stuart Adcock was the president and major shareholder, he even flew the planes sometimes and cleaned them after flights.
